section.title: Introduction
section.p: This is a collection of HOW-TOs. The Castor project is actively seeking additional HOW-TO contributors to expand this collection. For information on how to do that, please see 'How to write a How-to'. Note that document titles in light grey identify documents that do not exist yet and are thus in search of an author.
